title: Donald Trump sworn in as the 47th president
shortDescription: Donald Trump has been sworn in as the 47th president of the United States in Washington, D.C.

title: Melania Trump attends Inauguration Day ceremonies: See photos
shortDescription: Melania Trump attended her husband Donald Trump's inauguration Monday. See photos.

title: Leonard Peltier's life sentence commuted by Joe Biden
shortDescription: President Biden said the decision will allow Peltier, an 80-year-old Native American activist, to fulfill the remainder of his sentence from home.

title: Trump sworn in as 47th president, says 'golden age of America' begins
shortDescription: Donald Trump was sworn in Monday as the 47th president of the United States in one of the most remarkable political comebacks in U.S. history.

title: President Biden pardons brother James to shield him from investigation
shortDescription: President Joe Biden pardoned his brother James and other relatives for unspecified crimes, to protect them from Trump administration investigations.

title: Biden departs White House for final time as president, welcomes Trump
shortDescription: Joe Biden's presidency and half a century of public service come to an end as Donald Trump begins second term.

title: Where in DC did Elon Musk appear on Trump's inauguration day?
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's "first buddy," Elon Musk, was seemingly everywhere in D.C. on Inauguration Day. Where (and with whom) was the billionaire?

title: Trump begins Inauguration Day at St. John's Church
shortDescription: Donald Trump started his Inauguration Day events at St. John's Church.

title: Bidens greet Trumps at White House
shortDescription: President Biden hosted President-elect Donald Trump and his wife, Melania, at the White House in a traditional ceremony for incoming presidents.

title: Pence attends Trump inauguration, 4 years after Jan. 6 riot
shortDescription: The ex-VP said President-elect Trump 'endangered my family' on Jan. 6, 2021, but he will attend the ceremony cementing his old running mate's return.

title: Trump will order renaming 'Gulf of Mexico' to 'Gulf of America'
shortDescription: Donald Trump's incoming press secretary announced the change on X.

title: Drones, dogs and 25,000 personnel: Thick security at Trump inauguration
shortDescription: About 25,000 law enforcement and military personnel are deployed across Washington, but the FBI says no specific threats have been detected.

title: An elite audience inside Capitol Rotunda watched Trump's swearing in
shortDescription: Donald Trump took the oath of office in front of an elite audience crammed inside the Capitol Rotunda.

title: These Indian American voters are split on Usha Vance's historic rise
shortDescription: Usha Vance, 39, will be the first Indian American to be second lady. Some Indian Americans say they don't see her representing their community.

title: Trump to end 'electric vehicle mandate' in Day 1 executive order
shortDescription: Trump will declare a "national energy emergency" among several executive actions to carry out his long-promised "drill, baby, drill" agenda.

title: Trump executive order will effectively end gender X on passports
shortDescription: Donald Trump will make the declaration as part of a flurry of executive orders he is planning to sign after his noon inauguration.

title: Lawsuit awaits Elon Musk's DOGE as Trump takes office
shortDescription: An advocacy group is targeting Elon Musk's Department of Government Efficiency for allegedly violating transparency rules to advise Trump.

title: Trump to declare border emergency, use military to repel 'invasion'
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump is expected to sign at least 10 executive orders on border security Monday.

title: Gen. Mark Milley 'grateful' for Biden pardon before Trump inauguration
shortDescription: Gen. Mark Milley, the now-retired former chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff, commented on the pardon he received in Biden's final hours in office.

title: Biden issues pardons for Trump targets
shortDescription: President Joe Biden issued blanket preemptive pardons for potential targets of President-elect Donald Trump to shield them from criminal prosecution.

title: Live updates: Fact-checking Trump's presidential inauguration
shortDescription: The USA TODAY Fact Check Team analyzes claims from Donald Trump's presidential inauguration.

title: TikTok restores US service after Trump's executive order promise
shortDescription: TikTok restored service to US users on January 19 after briefly going offline due to a federal ban requiring its parent company, ByteDance, to sell its US operations.

title: Biden pardons Fauci, Cheney, others to shield from Trump inquiries
shortDescription: President Biden preemptively pardons Dr. Anthony Fauci, former GOP Rep. Liz Cheney, and retired Gen. Mark Milley to protect them from Trump inquiries.

title: Trump plans torrent of executive actions on eve of taking office
shortDescription: U.S. President-elect Donald Trump plans to sign a slew a executive orders on his first day in office.

title: Watch live: Donald Trump's inauguration inside the US Capitol
shortDescription: On Monday, President-elect Donald Trump will be sworn in as the 47th president in Washington, D.C.

title: Inauguration live updates: Donald Trump sworn in as 47th president
shortDescription: Donald Trump kicked off his second presidential term on Monday. Follow the USA TODAY Network's live updates.
